title: Which Red Velvet songs fall under the “red” category and which fall under the “velvet” category? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since I can’t list all, I’m only going to list a few Red: Ice Cream Cake Dumb Dumb Red Flavour Power Up Rookie #CookieJar Happiness Umpah Umpah Sappy Zoo Russian Roulette Sunny Afternoon ’Cause It’s You Aitai-Tai Stupid Cupid Happily ever After Fool My Second Date Swimming Pool There’s a bunch more I could but I’ll just stop it here lol Velvet: Automatic One Of These Nights Bad Boy Peek A Boo Kingdom Come Be Natural (ft. Taeyong) Cool Hot Sweet Love Rose Scent Breeze First Time Light Me Up Zimzalabim Hear The Sea Perfect 10 Really Bad Boy Candy Sayonara Taste Attaboy Moonlight Melody I Just Body Talk Eyes Locked, Hands Locked Ladies Night Look Little Little And Again…..There’s so many more I could list lol

I’m only doing Title Tracks because time. Soooooo Red: Happiness Dumb Dumb Rookie Cookie Jar Sappy Red Flavour Umpah Umpah Zimzalabim Russian Roulette Power Up Velvet: Peek-A-Boo Bad Boy One of These Nights Really Bad Boy Be Natural
